channel.title: <Project Trivia>"English Only"
channel.description:
Hey, i was at school and i remmeberd.. A long time ago people used to love pk servers and probably still do. but the servers now are aminly revolved about getting skills and so on..
I remeber pimpscape and i have had an idea of pimping it up big style... I have skillcapes allready and emotes. <(Real skillcapes btw)>
So what im thinking is that i could get a team of coders to help me get this server going.
Here are some pics. [img]http://www.christopher.uk.com/omg/Ricscape0000.png[/img] [img]http://www.christopher.uk.com/omg/Ricscape0002.png[/img] [img]http://www.christopher.uk.com/omg/Ricscape0003.png[/img] [img]http://www.christopher.uk.com/omg/Ricscape0004.png[/img] [img]http://www.christopher.uk.com/omg/Ricscape0005.png[/img]
The Goals Are: Make a 1v1 zone:Not Done Make a unique starting zone:Not Done Make NPC Training:Not Done Get Cwars Working:Not Done Get Working Dueling Anywhere:Not Done Make a Client: Done
Sign Up Form
[code]Age? How long have you been coding? What are you good at? Where do you come from? What make you code? [/code]

@runescape3 wrote:

Age? 14 Born November 2 1993
How long have you been coding? I’ve Joined Moparscape About a Year Ago
What are you good at? Clients And Servers, Also i Can Host If You Like.
Where do you come from? Usa Montana
What make you code? The Joy Of Making a World Of Runescape And Playing It With Others.

Also, I’d Like To Help Out.
